pages.title: Salt
pages.text: A fundamental reagent used to consecrate braziers for $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual)Natureâ€™s Rituals$(/l) and in several practical crafts.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: Crush $(l:hexalia:resources/crops#saltsprout)Saltsprout$(/l) with a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#mortar)Mortar and Pestle$(/l) to produce Salt. Saltsprout can be found via $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/mutation)Mutation$(/l) or in Herbalist Huts.

pages.title: Ritual Use
pages.text: Salt is applied to each $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual#braziers)Ritual Brazier$(/l) to consecrate it before starting a ritual. All four braziers must be salted for a valid setup.

pages.title: Tags & Substitutes
pages.text: Items with common tags $(thing)salt_dusts/salt$() or $(thing)salt_blocks$() may substitute for Salt in compatible recipes or offerings (when allowed).

pages.title: Leather (Purified)
pages.text: Purify Rotten Flesh with Salt to obtain Leather.

pages.title: Salt Block
pages.text: Compact storage for Salt. Useful when gathering large quantities.

pages.title: Salt Lamp
pages.text: Ambient light source (level ~12). Can be placed or hung.
